title: Are personal lifestyle blogs still profitable in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any blog has the opportunity to be profitable. What determines a blogs profits and success is the time you dedicate into writing quaity web articles, SEO, social media marketing and more. The only way to be successful in something is to take action and start making it a reality. Start writing content while learning more about blogging and marketing. Improve upon old content so that it ranks higher in Google while still working on new content.
